response.overview: Documentary about the Argentine-Israeli Bibas-Silberman family, victims of the Hamas attack on October 7, 2023, at Kibbutz Nir Oz. Shiri, her husband Yarden, and their children Ariel and Kfir were kidnapped, while Shiri's parents, José Luis and Margit, were murdered. Yarden was released after 484 days, but Shiri and the children were killed in captivity.
response.title: Bibas: asesinados por ser judíos
